translations.translation: It does not befit them and they are not capable of it.
They are not worthy of it, nor have they power.
nor does it behove them, nor does it lie in their power.
they are not supposed to do so. Nor do have they the ability for such a task.
They are unworthy of it, nor can they do it.
Neither would it suit them nor are they able.
And it behoves them not, and they have not the power to do (it).
it behoves them not, neither are they able.
It is not meet for them, nor is it in their power,
neither are they worthy of it, nor are they capable of it,
It behoveth them not, nor they can.
Neither does it behoove them, nor are they capable [of doing that].
It would neither suit them nor would they be able (to produce it).
Neither would it suit them, nor they can (produce it).
it is not for them, nor are they able.
It is not in their interests, nor in their power.
It is not allowable for them, nor would they be able.
[26:211] Neither would it behove, befit, them, to bring it down, nor are they capable, [of doing] that.

commentaries.author: ابن عباس
commentaries.text: وَمَا يَنْبَغِي لَهُمْ وَمَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ (211) فضمير { ينبغي } عائد إلى ما عاد عليه ضمير { به } ، أي ما ينبغي القرآن لهم ، أي ما ينبغي أن ينزلوا به كما زعم المشركون . ومفعول { يستطيعون } محذوف ، أي ما يستطيعونه . وأعيدت الضمائر بصيغة العقلاء بعد أن أضمر لهم بضمير غير العقلاء في قوله : { وما تنزلت } اعتباراً بملابسة ذلك للكهان . وقد تقدم في سورة الحجر أن صنفاً من الشياطين يتهيّأ للتلقي بما يسمَّى استراق السمع وأنه يصرف عنه بالشُّهب

translations.translation: (It is not meet for them) the devils are not fit to do so, (nor is it in their power) nor could they do this,
